high_descs: Turn to your right and walk to the baseball bat.
Pick up the baseball bat from the ground.
Turn around and walk to the desk with the green lamp on it.
anns.task_desc: Turn on the lamp while carrying a baseball bat.

high_descs: Turn right and walk to the wall.
Turn around and go to the nightstand.
anns.task_desc: Look at the baseball bat using the lamp light.

high_descs: Turn right, walk to the baseball bat
Grab the baseball bat on the floor
Turn around and turn right to the night stand
Turn on the lamp on the night stand
anns.task_desc: Grab the base ball bat on the floor, turn on the lamp on the night stand
